title: Looking for a font similar to the original 80s Superman movie logo
content:
I’m looking for something close to this. Any idea?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081022073635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/superMan_5573.jpg)

author: dohdoh

comments.content:
Actually 1978. But I can’t help you,  
so please ignore my pop culture nerdity
